I would seek out natural healing methods: I would look for alternative healing methods such as herbal medicine, acupuncture, massage therapy, and other forms of natural healing. I would also research and experiment with different diets and lifestyles that promote health and wellness.

I would join a self-sustaining community: I would look for a community of people who are self-sufficient and have the knowledge and skills to provide for their own needs. This could include a community garden, a shared medical library, and a network of skilled healers.

I would use technology to my advantage: I would use technology to connect with other medical professionals and to access medical information. I would use social media, online forums, and other digital tools to find information about health and wellness.

I would practice mindfulness and meditation: I would practice mindfulness and meditation to reduce stress and improve my overall well-being. This would involve learning techniques such as deep breathing, yoga, and meditation to calm my mind and body.

I would seek out alternative healing modalities: I would explore alternative healing modalities such as energy healing, hypnosis, and other forms of alternative medicine. I would also seek out alternative therapies such as chiropractic care, acupuncture, and other forms of holistic medicine.
